metadata.creator: Dave Trautman
metadata.description: This is the last episode of the year. The host discusses the problem experienced by the producers of the show. They replay parts of performances on the show over the last three weeks. The host converses with youth who helped produce the show, about topics such as why they chose to help make the show, what their role was, if they would like to come back and help, and their experiences/impressions of the show. The host then interviews David Deltrama, the director of the show, in English. He discusses the importance of communication within cultural groups, the problems they experienced and when the show will start back up. Ivan, the coordinator of the Nosotros program finishes the episode by thanking those who made the show possible.
metadata.title: Programa Nosotros. Final Episode of the Year
metadata.subject: Summary; Director; Volunteers; Coordinator; Resumen; voluntarios; coordinador
